divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting ready to go to school I was sitting on my porch looking at the stars. The one of them started to move almost in a straight line then did a loop around a star. Then went to the other side of the horizon then disappears . No flash just one light I was standing still then once I was gone I ran into the house . Nobody else got to see it. I am in middle school nothing to gain or lose.
